MLONL.PA.summary: Onlineformapro S.A operates an e-learning platform that enables small and medium companies, training institutions, universities, large groups, professionals, and individuals to access training supported by an online tutor. The company develops and hosts a Web call center of asynchronous tutoring for chatting and video conferencing in order to establish a formative relationship between tutors and learners focusing on e-learning training. It provides an OnlineManager platform that offers users a series of educational and administrative features, such as a training organization, access to a specific course, and follow-up of the course; OnlineAuteur, a suite of Web tools to create various evaluations and online training modules based on Adobe Flash technology; and OnlineAgora, a product that allows to set up collaborative and communitary portals. The company also offers OnlineVisio, a Web conferencing solution that enables users to organize a virtual group session with their learners and collaborators using an Internet browser; OnlineFormation, a catalogue comprising various e-learning operational and interactive modules; customized development modules; and SGTools, which design serious games adapted to a client's business needs by combining educational and play scenarios with technologies coming from video games. In addition, it provides consulting, training, development and integration, and hosting services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Vesoul, France.

MLSIL.PA.summary: Sejours Internat. Linguistique Culture was founded in 1981 and is based in Angouleme, France.
